translation.en: [man] When I was eight and a half, I went to Comiskey Park.
translation.zh: 我八岁半的时候去了科米斯基体育场

translation.en: And I was holding hands with my father.
translation.zh: 我和父亲手拉着手

translation.en: And somebody told me that my dad ran the Chicago White Sox.
translation.zh: 有人告诉我 我的爸爸运营着芝加哥白袜队

translation.en: And I thought that was so cool
translation.zh: 我觉得很酷

translation.en: that he had this playground where guys played baseball.
translation.zh: 他有一个操场 人们在那里玩棒球

translation.en: But mostly, now what I remember is holding his hand.
translation.zh: 但现在我记得 印象最深的是握着他的手

translation.en: ♪ You know she comes around ♪
translation.zh: （芝加哥）

translation.en: [Jeff Daniels] This is the true story of a family of baseball hustlers.
translation.zh: 这是棒球鬼才家庭的真实故事

translation.en: It's a story about fathers and sons, and fathers and daughters.
translation.zh: 这是一个关于父子、父女的故事

translation.en: You know, the complicated stuff.
translation.zh: 你知道 复杂的东西

translation.en: Now we're going to spend a lot of time talking about the infamous Bill Veeck.
translation.zh: 我们要花很多时间谈论 臭名昭著的比尔·维克

translation.en: But the real hero of our story is his son, Mike,
translation.zh: 但我们故事的真正英雄 是他的儿子迈克

translation.en: a guy who struggled to be a good son and accidentally became a great dad.
translation.zh: 拼命挣扎成为一个好儿子 然后意外成为一个好父亲

translation.en: [Mike] Where do we even start?
translation.zh: 我们从哪里开始呢？

translation.en: It's just kind of a weird story.
translation.zh: 这就是个有点奇怪的故事

translation.en: [Daniels] Let's start at the bottom.
translation.zh: 我们从底部开始

translation.en: Florida in the '80s.
translation.zh: 80年代的佛罗里达

translation.en: Mike Veeck had lost everything that mattered to him.
translation.zh: 迈克·维克失去了对他重要的一切

translation.en: [Daniels] There was a time when the Veeck name used to mean something.
translation.zh: 曾经有一段时间 维克这个名字有一些意义

translation.en: His father, Bill, was the peg-legged owner of a string of teams,
translation.zh: 他的父亲 比尔 是一系列球队的跛脚老板

translation.en: including the Chicago White Sox.
translation.zh: 包括芝加哥白袜队

translation.en: He had the audacity to believe
translation.zh: 他有勇气相信

translation.en: that baseball wasn't about winning or losing or even money.
translation.zh: 棒球重要的不是输赢或者钱

translation.en: It was about something more.
translation.zh: 是更重要的东西

translation.en: We have never sold a game
translation.zh: 我们从没有把比赛当做

translation.en: as the most delightful way to spend an afternoon or an evening.
translation.zh: 度过一下午或一晚上时间 最愉快的方式出售过

translation.en: [Daniels] Bill wasn't just another owner.
translation.zh: 比尔不只是又一个普通老板

translation.en: Bill changed baseball.
translation.zh: 比尔改变了棒球

translation.en: And Mike, in trying to prove himself,
translation.zh: 而迈克在尝试证明自己的时候

translation.en: blew it all up.
translation.zh: 把一切都搞砸了

translation.en: [man chanting] Disco sucks!
translation.zh: 迪斯科糟透了！

translation.en: Disco sucks!
translation.zh: 迪斯科糟透了！

translation.en: [Daniels] You know, Bill had a saying. That at the end of nine innings,
translation.zh: 比尔有句话 九局结束时

translation.en: you know who won, you know who lost.
translation.zh: 你就知道谁赢了 谁输了

translation.en: But most importantly, you get to start all over the next day.
translation.zh: 但最重要的是 你可以在第二天重新开始

translation.en: ♪ Gloria ♪ ♪ I'm gonna shout it all night ♪ ♪ Gloria ♪
translation.zh: （超凡转机：美国职棒鬼才家族）

translation.en: [interviewer] Let's go back to when you were starting out.
translation.zh: 我们回到你刚开始的时候吧

translation.en: How much were you trying to get away from your father's shadow?
translation.zh: 你有多努力从父亲的影子里逃离？

translation.en: How much?
translation.zh: 多努力？

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe 140%. I mean--
translation.zh: 我不知道 可能有140% 我是说…

translation.en: I wanted nothing to do with--
translation.zh: 我一点都不想卷入那些…

translation.en: With the-- You know, what had already become the legendary stories.
translation.zh: 那些… 你知道 那些已经变成传奇的故事

translation.en: And it wasn't that I didn't admire my father or love my father.
translation.zh: 不是我不敬爱我的父亲 或者不爱我的父亲

translation.en: I just wanted no part of that constant comparison.
translation.zh: 我只是不想要那种持续的比较

translation.en: There seemed to be no way that you could win.
translation.zh: 而你看起来不可能赢

translation.en: It's 1975, and baseball's for losers.
translation.zh: 1975年 棒球是为失败者而设的

translation.en: [Daniels] Mike was doing anything he could to get away from Bill's shadow.
translation.zh: 迈克做了一切他能做的 来摆脱比尔的影子

translation.en: [Mike] He would show up every once in a while at places where we'd play.
translation.zh: 他会偶尔出现在我们会比赛的地方

translation.en: [director] How would you feel about playing your dad in this movie?
translation.zh: 你在这部电影里 扮演你父亲有什么感觉？

translation.en: I'm not cutting off my leg. Period.
translation.zh: 我不会自断双臂 没门

translation.en: When he goes, "Let's have lunch,"
translation.zh: 当他说“一起吃午饭吧”

translation.en: that was a euphemism in our house for "Let's go drink beer."
translation.zh: 那是我们家 对“一起去喝啤酒”的委婉说法

translation.en: We drank a lot of beer.
translation.zh: 我们喝了很多啤酒

translation.en: And I don't know, a scant 11 hours later,
translation.zh: 我不知道 才11个小时之后

translation.en: he said to me, "I'm gonna go to Chicago, and I'm gonna buy the White Sox."
translation.zh: 他对我说 “我要去芝加哥买下白袜队”

translation.en: "And I'd love you to come." And I was flabbergasted.
translation.zh: “我很想让你一起来” 我很震惊

translation.en: I was, like, just blown away.
translation.zh: 我被惊讶得不知所措

translation.en: I can see him pick up the flute
translation.zh: 我能看到他在我桌子的对面

translation.en: right across the table from me, in between beers,
translation.zh: 喝啤酒期间拿起长笛引诱我

translation.en: and start to play this music.
translation.zh: 开始演奏这个音乐

translation.en: …I don't know. [laughs]
translation.zh: …我不知道

translation.en: I mean, he was the Pied Piper.
translation.zh: 我是说 他就是引诱人的魔笛手

translation.en: When he said, "You know, this could be the last hurrah,"
translation.zh: 他说 “你知道 这可能是最后的努力”

translation.en: he made no bones about the fact that we were going to be underfinanced.
translation.zh: 他对我们资金不足的事毫不掩饰

translation.en: There wasn't enough money.
translation.zh: 钱不够

translation.en: It was us against the world.
translation.zh: 是我们与世界对抗

translation.en: We're gonna do something
translation.zh: 我们要做一些

translation.en: that are gonna make people sit up and take notice.
translation.zh: 让人们坐直并且注意到的事情

translation.en: It was a crusade.
translation.zh: 那是一场十字军东征

translation.en: We were on the side of all that was good and light.
translation.zh: 我们站在善良与光明的一边

translation.en: Cheers to that.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: And I said to him, you know--
translation.zh: 我给他说 你知道…

translation.en: We don't really know each other, right?
translation.zh: 我们不是很了解彼此 对吧？

translation.en: And he said, "Well, maybe it would be a chance to get to know each other."
translation.zh: 他说 “那可能是一个 开始了解彼此的机会”

translation.en: And that was it. He had me hook, line, and sinker.
translation.zh: 就这样 他完全引诱到了我

translation.en: [Daniels] So, now instead of running from his dad's shadow,
translation.zh: 所以 现在迈克不再 逃离他父亲的影子了

translation.en: Mike was running towards it.
translation.zh: 而是迎面走向它

translation.en: If ignorance is bliss, then Mike was in heaven.
translation.zh: 如果无知是幸福 那迈克当时就在天堂

translation.en: [interviewer] So what was the first day like?
translation.zh: 所以第一天是什么样子的？

translation.en: It was horrible. What do you think it was like?
translation.zh: 太可怕了 你觉得能是什么样的？

translation.en: It was what the world didn't need, was another owner's kid.
translation.zh: 这是世界并不需要的 又一个老板的孩子

translation.en: You could almost see people roll their eyes. I mean, just… Oh!
translation.zh: 你几乎可以看到 人们翻白眼 我是说 就…

translation.en: "God, I never expected this from Bill Veeck,
translation.zh: “上帝 我从没想到比尔·维克会这样

translation.en: for him to employ one of his kids."
translation.zh: 会去雇佣自己的一个孩子”

translation.en: But I can outwork you.
translation.zh: 但我可以比你更努力工作

translation.en: And that was my plan.
translation.zh: 那就是我的计划

translation.en: I was just gonna go, and I was gonna outwork everybody.
translation.zh: 我就直接过去 比每个人都努力工作

translation.en: If everybody stayed 16 hours,
translation.zh: 如果大家都干16个小时

translation.en: I was gonna stay 17 hours and earn their respect.
translation.zh: 我就要干17个小时 赢得他们的尊敬

translation.en: And I think that his attitude would have been,
translation.zh: 我认为他的态度可能是

translation.en: "Well, if he flames out because he's not very smart, that's okay."
translation.zh: “好吧 如果他失败 是因为他不太聪明 那没关系”

translation.en: So, it was also a test to see if--
translation.zh: 所以 这也是一个考验 去看看…

translation.en: You know, if I had any stuff.
translation.zh: 我是否有商业悟性

translation.en: And I was terrified.
translation.zh: 我很害怕

translation.en: [reporter] Here they are. Hi, Veecks. Let's just walk around and get their names.
translation.zh: 他们在这里 嗨 维克一家 我们来问问他们的名字

translation.en: -What is your name? -Michael Veeck.
translation.zh: -你叫什么名字？ -迈克尔·维克

translation.en: -How old are you, Michael? -Eleven.
translation.zh: -你多大了 迈克尔？ -十一

translation.en: Eleven years old.
translation.zh: 十一岁

translation.en: [Mike] We lived in this old house.
translation.zh: 我们住在一个老房子里

translation.en: There were nine kids.
translation.zh: 有九个孩子

translation.en: And so, growing up,
translation.zh: 所以小时候

translation.en: we would have fire drills.
translation.zh: 我们会有消防演习

translation.en: My job was to grab the idea box.
translation.zh: 我的工作是拿创意盒

translation.en: And the idea box was filled with every gag
translation.zh: 创意盒被里面装满了爸爸妈妈

translation.en: that Mom and Dad or visitors had thought of.
translation.zh: 和访客想过的所有笑话创意

translation.en: In our house, cocktail napkins and matchbooks, especially,
translation.zh: 在我们家 尤其是鸡尾酒纸巾和火柴盒

translation.en: were considered card files.
translation.zh: 被认为是卡片文件

translation.en: If the house was on fire,
translation.zh: 如果房子着火了

translation.en: you didn't grab the art.
translation.zh: 你不去拿走艺术品

translation.en: What a wonderful lesson.
translation.zh: 真是很好的一课

translation.en: And I never forgot that.
translation.zh: 我从来没有忘记

translation.en: [reporter] Bill, what's behind your theory of showmanship in baseball?
translation.zh: 比尔 你对棒球表演的理论 背后有什么故事？

translation.en: Well, I happen to have a very ridiculous theory,
translation.zh: 好吧 我刚好有一个荒谬的理论

translation.en: according to great many ball club operators,
translation.zh: 很多球类俱乐部经营者都说

translation.en: that it should be fun.
translation.zh: 经营球队应该很有趣

translation.en: [Daniels] In December of '75, Bill begged and borrowed enough money
translation.zh: 1975年的12月 比尔乞求借贷了足够的钱

translation.en: to buy the Chicago White Sox.
translation.zh: 以买下芝加哥白袜队

translation.en: But keep in mind, this was insane.
translation.zh: 但记住 这太疯狂了

translation.en: He'd been out of the game for over a decade at this point,
translation.zh: 他已经离开这个比赛十多年了

translation.en: and things had changed.
translation.zh: 很多事情已经变了

translation.en: Bill wasn't rich like today's owners.
translation.zh: 比尔不像如今的老板那么有钱

translation.en: He was the last of the old-time baseball hustlers.
translation.zh: 他是最后一个旧时代棒球的鬼才

translation.en: We have been pursuing this for some time,
translation.zh: 我们这件事已经努力了一段时间

translation.en: and it, on occasion, looked as if we might not make it.
translation.zh: 偶尔看起来好像我们不一定会成功

translation.en: And so, you really must forgive me
translation.zh: 所以 你们真的必须原谅我

translation.en: for not having prepared a magnificent oration.
translation.zh: 没有准备好一段精彩的演讲

translation.en: He was the return of the savior.
translation.zh: 他是救世主的回归

translation.en: [Daniels] And Chicago needed to be saved.
translation.zh: 芝加哥需要被拯救

translation.en: On the South Side, the factories were dying
translation.zh: 在南边 工厂正在倒闭

translation.en: and the stadium was falling apart. There wasn't a lot of hope.
translation.zh: 体育馆也在瓦解 没有很多希望

translation.en: -Bill! How you doing? -[laughing] Hi. Fine, thanks.
translation.zh: -比尔！你好吗？ -你好 还不错 谢谢

translation.en: All right. So!
translation.zh: 好吧 先生！

translation.en: [Mike] There was rejoicing in the streets.
translation.zh: 街上有欢呼声

translation.en: In Chicago?
translation.zh: 在芝加哥？

translation.en: Oh, couldn't get no bigger than Bill Veeck.
translation.zh: 没有比他更大的人物了

translation.en: He was the man.
translation.zh: 他就是大人物

translation.en: [Mike] He was in the phone book.
translation.zh: 他的电话号是公众信息

translation.en: He frequented the same saloons that they went to.
translation.zh: 他经常去他们去过的酒馆

translation.en: He used cabs as a source of marketing research.
translation.zh: 他把出租车当做一种市场调查的来源

translation.en: And even now, people tell me, "I was a Sox fan because of the owner."
translation.zh: 甚至现在 还有人告诉我 “我是 白袜队的粉丝 是因为它的老板”

translation.en: [Mike] He was one of them. That's exactly how they felt.
translation.zh: 他就是他们的一员 这就是他们的感觉

translation.en: [Daniels] And if Chicago was the Second City,
translation.zh: 如果芝加哥是第二城市

translation.en: the White Sox had always been their second team.
translation.zh: 白袜队就一直是他们的第二队伍

translation.en: Scrappy underdogs to the crosstown Cubs.
translation.zh: 城市另一端的小熊队的手下败将

translation.en: [Dombrowski] We knew we weren't really a very good club.
translation.zh: 我们知道我们 不算是一个很好的俱乐部

translation.en: There were no expectations of winning your division or winning a pennant.
translation.zh: 人们不会期望你赢下级别赛或者锦旗

translation.en: [Chicoine] But Bill had a plan.
translation.zh: 但比尔有个计划

translation.en: Get people in the seats and good things will happen.
translation.zh: 让人们坐满观众席 好事就会发生

translation.en: Oh, this is a wonderful ballpark.
translation.zh: 这是一个令人惊叹的棒球场

translation.en: [Daniels] Bill didn't have an office.
translation.zh: 比尔没有办公室

translation.en: He ran the team from a little bar deep inside Comiskey.
translation.zh: 他在科米斯基腹地的 一个小酒吧经营团队

translation.en: The press and visiting teams were always welcome.
translation.zh: 媒体和访问团队一直都很受欢迎

translation.en: It was the Bard's Room.
translation.zh: 那是巴德的房间

translation.en: [Mike] You walk into the Bard's Room,
translation.zh: 你走进巴德的房间

translation.en: and suddenly, all of these baseball cards come alive.
translation.zh: 突然 所有那些的棒球人物卡片 都走到了现实生活中

translation.en: And now I had to figure out how I could earn a seat at that table.
translation.zh: 现在我必须想出如何才能 在他们之间赢得一席地位

translation.en: [reporter] Bill, how much do you know about baseball?
translation.zh: 比尔 你对棒球了解多少？

translation.en: [Bill] I'm pretty good.
translation.zh: 我很厉害

translation.en: I've seen more ball games than almost anybody you can find around.
translation.zh: 我看过的棒球比赛 几乎比你认识的任何人都多

translation.en: [Daniels] This is an understatement.
translation.zh: 这是低估的说法

translation.en: Bill has seen it all.
translation.zh: 比尔全都看过

translation.en: His dad ran the Cubs.
translation.zh: 他爸爸经营过小熊队

translation.en: So, when he was a gopher like Mike, he planted the famous ivy at Wrigley.
translation.zh: 所以当年他像迈克一样干杂活的时候 在瑞格利种下了著名的常青藤

translation.en: And when he owned the Indians, he integrated the American League
translation.zh: 当他拥有印第安人时 他将美国联盟与拉里·多比

translation.en: with Larry Doby and Satchel Paige.
translation.zh: 和萨奇·佩吉整合在了一起

translation.en: But what you don't hear is that legend has it,
translation.zh: 但你没听过的是 传说中

translation.en: years before Jackie Robinson,
translation.zh: 在杰基·罗宾森几年前

translation.en: he schemed to buy the Phillies
translation.zh: 他就谋划着买下费城人队

translation.en: and replace all the white players with Black players.
translation.zh: 并用黑人球员替换掉所有白人球员

translation.en: But that plan didn't get very far.
translation.zh: 但那个计划没有执行到底

translation.en: All the fun stuff that happens at baseball games today,
translation.zh: 今天在棒球比赛中发生的所有趣事

translation.en: fireworks, giveaways, promos, you name it, Bill invented it.
translation.zh: 烟花表演、现场抽奖、商品广告 你能想到的 都是比尔发明的

translation.en: Oh, and he also brought in this guy, Eddie Gaedel, to pinch-hit one time.
translation.zh: 他还把艾迪·盖德尔这个人带进来 替补上场了一次

translation.en: He was a dwarf. It's a whole other story.
translation.zh: 他是个小矮人 那完全是另一个故事了

translation.en: So, yeah, Bill knows a thing or two about baseball.
translation.zh: 所以 比尔对棒球略知一二

translation.en: No, what you are creating is a ground rule in which greed reigns supreme.
translation.zh: 你正在创造的是 贪婪是最重要的基本原则

translation.en: And after every home game, I'd come up there.
translation.zh: 每次主场比赛后 我都会上那里去

translation.en: -He loved to stimulate a conversation. -Now…
translation.zh: -他喜欢引起对话 -现在…

translation.en: [La Russa] And once it got going, he'd just sit back with a big smile on his face.
translation.zh: 一旦对话开始 他就只是 面带微笑悠闲地坐在那里

translation.en: That's where the education came from.
translation.zh: 这就是教育的源头

translation.en: [Mike] I was mute. I got beers for people. I fetched.
translation.zh: 我很沉默 我给大家准备了酒 我去拿

translation.en: It was a crusade.
translation.zh: 那是一场十字军东征

translation.en: And I was on my own crusade too.
translation.zh: 我也有自己的十字军东征

translation.en: [Dombrowski] Mike wanted to keep him in the game.
translation.zh: 迈克想让他继续参与比赛

translation.en: And we knew that if the White Sox situation broke up,
translation.zh: 而我们知道 如果白袜队的情况崩了

translation.en: that that would mean the end of he and his dad
translation.zh: 将意味着他和他爸爸

translation.en: probably ever working together or being together.
translation.zh: 在一起工作或者在一起 可能就彻底结束了

translation.en: [Daniels] And Bill Veeck was a marked man. The other owners, the baseball purists,
translation.zh: 比尔·维克是个有名的人 其他的老板 棒球纯粹主义者

translation.en: they wanted nothing more than to see him fail.
translation.zh: 最想看到的就是他失败

translation.en: Bill was gonna have to pull out all the stops to stay afloat.
translation.zh: 比尔必须全力以赴来维持生计

translation.en: [man] Would you please form single-file lines at the gate?
translation.zh: 可以在门口排成一排吗？

translation.en: Okay, now, this song we're gonna play for Bill Veeck. Here we go.
translation.zh: 好 现在我们要为比尔·维克 演奏这首歌 开始了

translation.en: [Mike] In 1977, boy, we needed a miracle.
translation.zh: 在1977年 天啊 我们需要一个奇迹

translation.en: Happy days. The opening day today, all right!
translation.zh: 开心的日子 今天是开幕日 好！

translation.en: Go, White Sox!
translation.zh: 加油 白袜！

translation.en: [interviewer] So, what was your pitch to the fans?
translation.zh: 你给粉丝的口号是什么？

translation.en: It was very simple.
translation.zh: 很简单

translation.en: [Bill] There's nothing to giving everyone in a ballpark an Eskimo Pie.
translation.zh: 给球场每个人 一个巧克力脆皮冰淇淋没什么意思

translation.en: But to give one person 30,000 Eskimo Pies,
translation.zh: 但只给一个人 三万个巧克力脆皮冰淇淋

translation.zh: 因为我们怎样成功地向迪斯科致敬

translation.zh: 在开幕日的早上 迈克去了球场中央

translation.zh: -你这样认为吗？ -毫无疑问

translation.zh: 他们认为女人不能打棒球 让我告诉你谁不能打棒球

translation.zh: 我不能打棒球 好吧？你可以打棒球

translation.zh: 我想让你为了圣保罗圣徒试一试

translation.zh: 你愿意吗？

translation.zh: 我说了 “这就是我想要的一切 我不想要合同”

translation.zh: “我不希望有任何东西送给我 我只想要一个机会”

translation.zh: 我可能是在花名册上 他们最不愿意挑选的人 但我成功了

translation.zh: 圣保罗的中途球场 继续做伊拉·博德斯的梦想之地

translation.en: She's now officially the first woman
translation.zh: 她现在正式成为了

translation.en: to make the roster of a men's professional baseball team.
translation.zh: 第一个进入 男子职业棒球队花名册的女人

translation.en: [Borders] Then I get to pro ball with the Saints, and people were cheering.
translation.zh: 然后我和圣徒们参加了职业球赛 人们在欢呼

translation.en: Like, a sold-out crowd cheering.
translation.zh: 全场观众都在欢呼

translation.en: I wasn't used to that.
translation.zh: 我不习惯那样

translation.en: Strike!
translation.zh: 好球！

translation.en: Jackpot!
translation.zh: 头奖

translation.en: It sounds funny. You think that would be good,
translation.zh: 很有趣 你认为那会很不错

translation.zh: 但我花了一些时间 才去习惯人们真正为我欢呼

translation.en: [Karlen] It enthused St. Paul in a way I'd never seen before.
translation.zh: 它以一种我从未见过的方式 让圣保罗充满了热情

translation.zh: 他们真的需要一些东西 而圣徒提供了这个东西

translation.zh: 那是一段美好的魔法时间

translation.zh: 是他

translation.zh: 他找到了更多的稳定 他回到了比赛中

translation.zh: 这是他在圣保罗开启的项目

translation.en: and he was more consistent on every level.
translation.zh: 他在每个层面上都更稳定

translation.en: I had a little girl and a young son who adored each other.
translation.zh: 我有一对互相喜欢的小女儿和小儿子

translation.en: It really made parenting easy.
translation.zh: 这让养育他们变得很容易

translation.en: Pretty much the four of us did everything together.
translation.zh: 差不多我们四个做所有事情都一起

translation.en: Get your St. Paul Saints programs right here.
translation.zh: 在这里拿到你的圣保罗圣徒项目

translation.zh: 他变得很快

translation.en: Great hand-eye because of all that Game Boy work.
translation.zh: 因为他进行的男孩比赛 他眼疾手快

translation.en: He could fill a rack of Cokes like nobody's business.
translation.zh: 他可以轻松自如填满一货架可乐 谁都做不到

translation.en: You don't know how many child labor laws you're breaking,
translation.zh: 你不知道自己违反了多少条童工法

translation.en: and-- and frankly, how much you're loving it.
translation.zh: 坦白讲 你很爱它

translation.zh: 你逼丽贝卡做了什么工作？

translation.en: She was a greeter.
translation.zh: 她是一个迎宾小姐

translation.en: And every time that door opened, this little towhead
translation.zh: 每次那个门打开 这个亚麻色头发的小女孩

translation.en: would jump up and go, "Hi!"
translation.zh: 会跳起来说“嗨！”

translation.en: -"Hi! Hi, I'm Rebecca." -"Hello."
translation.zh: -“嗨！嗨 我是丽贝卡” -“你好”

translation.en: [Stevens] Rebecca was so much to that team.
translation.zh: 丽贝卡对那支球队很重要

translation.en: And she-- she was the mascot.
translation.zh: 她是吉祥物

translation.en: That pig that took the balls out, no, that was not the mascot.
translation.zh: 那个把球拿出来的猪不是吉祥物

translation.en: And they rallied around her.
translation.zh: 他人们会聚集在她周围

translation.en: Mascotting of any flavor, costumes, just her.
translation.zh: 任何风格的吉祥物 没有服饰 只有她

translation.zh: 今年年末 有一个

translation.en: that-- that gave a report about the Saints, and said,
translation.zh: 做了圣徒报告的顾问说

translation.en: "You need to… You need to lose the little girl at the front door." "It's not professional."
translation.zh: “你需要弄走那个门前的小女孩 这很不专业”

translation.en: God! "A little more professional."
translation.zh: 天啊 ！“更专业一点”

translation.en: [Huidekoper] Word of mouth got out. I mean, we hardly had to do advertising.
translation.zh: 口耳相传 我们几乎不用做广告

translation.en: It was just like this ripple effect.
translation.zh: 就有这种连锁反应

translation.en: One reason for St. Paul's success? The shtick of Mike Veeck.
translation.zh: 圣保罗成功的原因之一？ 迈克·维克的幽默

translation.en: We come here because we feel welcome here. You know, it's fun.
translation.zh: 我们来这里是因为在这里我们感觉 受到了欢迎 你知道 很有趣

translation.en: You know, that old dilemma. "Why can't we know we're in the good old days
translation.zh: 那个旧的困境“我们以前为什么

translation.zh: 身在福中不知福？”

translation.en: Baseball. Real outdoor baseball. Baseball? Yeah!
translation.zh: -棒球 真正的户外棒球 -棒球？对

translation.en: We sold out 600 games in a row or something ridiculous.
translation.zh: 我们连续售罄了600场比赛 差不多就是这么荒唐

translation.en: [Daniels] This doesn't get said enough, but the St. Paul Saints changed baseball.
translation.zh: 怎样说都不过分 但圣保罗圣徒队改变了棒球

translation.en: All the fun that happens today at independent and minor league games,
translation.zh: 今天在独立和职业棒球小联盟 比赛中的所有乐趣

translation.en: you name it, Mike invented it.
translation.zh: 你能想到的 都是迈克发明的

translation.en: [reporter] When you first came to town, though,
translation.zh: 但你刚来镇上的时候

translation.en: you had a lot of people waiting for you to fail and predicting your doom.
translation.zh: 有很多人在等你失败 预测你完蛋

translation.en: God bless them.
translation.zh: 上帝保佑他们

translation.en: [announcer] This is what it's all about now, with a full house all on their feet.
translation.zh: 这就是现在的重点 全场站立

translation.en: [Mike] My dad would have loved St. Paul.
translation.zh: 我爸也会喜欢圣保罗的

translation.en: He would have understood that it was street theater
translation.zh: 他会理解这是个街头剧场

translation.en: wrapped around a ball game.
translation.zh: 环绕着一场球赛

translation.en: [Bill] This world would be better
translation.zh: 如果更多人不把事情

translation.en: if more people didn't take it too seriously.
translation.zh: 看得太严肃 这个世界就会更好

translation.en: You know, it isn't grim. It's kind of wonderful.
translation.zh: 你知道 这不冷酷 这还挺好的

translation.en: [announcer 1] Solomon will set. The one-two. He swings.
translation.zh: 所罗门会定局 一二 他挥击

translation.en: It goes toward right field.
translation.zh: 它朝着正确的方向前进了

translation.en: It is dropping in for a big hit.
translation.zh: 要打中了

translation.en: And the Saints win it, 3-2!
translation.zh: 圣徒队以3比2获胜！

translation.en: [announcer 2] St. Paul, the Northern League Champions for 1993!
translation.zh: 圣保罗 北方联盟1993年的冠军！

translation.en: Your whole approach is to have fun,
translation.zh: 你的整个方法就是寻找乐趣

translation.en: but the last thing you want is another Disco Demolition disaster.
translation.zh: 但你最不想要的就是 再一次迪斯科毁灭灾难

translation.en: Did you feel in your mind that you were still wearing
translation.zh: 你到圣保罗的时候

translation.en: that scarlet letter when you arrived in St. Paul?
translation.zh: 你觉得还是带有羞愧吗？

translation.en: "Owner's son strikes out."
translation.zh: 《老板的儿子三振出局》

translation.en: Baseball reference. Clever.
translation.zh: 引用棒球术语 聪明

translation.en: You agree with that, pig?
translation.zh: 你同意吗 小猪？

translation.en: Yeah? All right.
translation.zh: 嗯？好吧

translation.en: What you got for me on this one? "You suck. Failure."
translation.zh: 你这次给我带来了什么？ “你真烂 失败”

translation.en: Okay. You made your point.
translation.zh: 好 你说得有道理

translation.en: Mike, let me ask you, you've been in the major leagues.
translation.zh: 迈克 你参加过美国职棒大联盟

translation.en: Would you like another shot at the show?
translation.zh: 你想在业界再试一次吗？

translation.en: For 15 years, I dreamed of making it back to the major leagues.
translation.zh: 15年来 我一直梦想回到大联盟

translation.en: That was all I ever thought about, was the return.
translation.zh: 我满脑子想的就是回归

translation.en: [Daniels] Mike had to be honest with himself.
translation.zh: 迈克必须对自己诚实

translation.en: It wasn't going to happen.
translation.zh: 那是不可能的

translation.en: So, he did what any workaholic would do.
translation.zh: 所以他做了任何工作狂都会做的事

translation.en: He bought more teams.
translation.zh: 他买了更多球队

translation.en: The Butte Copper Kings.
translation.zh: 特铜矿国王队

translation.en: The Charleston RiverDogs.
translation.zh: 查尔斯顿河狗队

translation.en: The Hudson Valley Renegades.
translation.zh: 哈德森谷叛徒队

translation.en: The Sioux Fall Canaries.
translation.zh: 苏瀑市金丝雀队

translation.en: The Brockton Rox.
translation.zh: 布罗克顿罗克斯队

translation.en: The Lake Havasu River Trout.
translation.zh: 哈瓦苏湖红点鲑队

translation.en: I just made that one up.
translation.zh: 这是我刚刚编造的

translation.en: And everywhere he went, the circus followed.
translation.zh: 他去过的所有地方 都有一群人跟着

translation.en: In the late '90s, everything was coming together.
translation.zh: 在20世纪90年代末期 一切都在变好

translation.en: But Mike was about to be tested, because little did he know--
translation.zh: 但迈克要接受考验 他根本不知道…

translation.en: [all] Little did he know!
translation.zh: 他根本不知道！

translation.en: Little did he know, in St. Paul, redemption is a two-way street.
translation.zh: …他根本不知道 在圣保罗 救赎是双向的

translation.en: Strawberry was an interesting…
translation.zh: 史卓贝瑞是个有趣的…

translation.en: Did I… Have I told you the story about him?
translation.zh: 我给你讲过他的故事吗？

translation.en: He was almost, as a player, as a young player, bigger than life.
translation.zh: 他作为球员 作为一个年轻球员 名气很大

translation.en: [announcer] Well hit! Way back! Deep center field!
translation.zh: 打得好！往后去了！深入中场！

translation.en: Darryl Strawberry has done it again!
translation.zh: 达尔·史卓贝瑞又做到了！

translation.en: He had 300 home runs before Mickey Mantle had 300 home runs.
translation.zh: 他在米奇·曼托有300次本垒打之前 就有了300次本垒打

translation.en: [Stevens] Darryl Strawberry is probably the greatest professional baseball player,
translation.zh: 达尔·史卓贝瑞可能是 最棒的职业棒球选手

translation.en: that had the greatest tools…
translation.zh: 拥有最棒的工具…

translation.en: and threw it all away.
translation.zh: 全部抛弃了

translation.en: [reporter 1] The 38-year-old walked calmly in handcuffs,
translation.zh: 这位38岁的人带着手铐冷静地走着

translation.en: once again facing criminal charges.
translation.zh: 再次面临刑事指控

translation.en: And investigators say it all stems from driving under the influence.
translation.zh: 调查员说这一切源于服药驾驶

translation.en: [reporter 2] Darryl, do you have anything to say?
translation.zh: 达尔 你有话要说吗？

translation.en: [Karlen] What he had screwed up was remarkable.
translation.zh: 他所犯下的错误是让人瞩目的

translation.en: He lost a $20.6 million contract.
translation.zh: 他损失了2060万美元的合同

translation.en: And I think it was 206 teams turned him down.
translation.zh: 我觉得是被206支球队拒绝了他

translation.en: Every team in organized baseball.
translation.zh: 每一个有组织棒球的球队

translation.en: And the only time I'd heard of something like "206 available, nobody wants him,"
translation.zh: 我唯一一次听到 “206个 没人想要他”的话

translation.en: was Mike Veeck after Disco Demolition night.
translation.zh: 是在迪斯科毁灭之夜后的 迈克·维克

translation.en: Why did you end up in St. Paul?
translation.zh: 你最后为什么会去圣保罗？

translation.en: That's a really good question.
translation.zh: 这真是个好问题

translation.en: Probably because of… a guy like Mike Veeck.
translation.zh: 可能是因为迈克·维克这样的人

translation.en: [Mike] So, I'm driving to Owatonna.
translation.zh: 所以我开车去奥瓦通纳

translation.en: I have a speaking engagement, and I decide
translation.zh: 我有个演讲要做 我决定

translation.en: that I'm gonna make this a nice evening with Libby.
translation.zh: 我要和利比一起度过一个美好的夜晚

translation.en: So, we get a bottle of champagne.
translation.zh: 所以我们弄了一瓶香槟

translation.en: And he got a call from Marvin about Darryl.
translation.zh: 他接到了马文的电话 是达尔的事情

translation.en: [Mike] And they're all over it.
translation.zh: 他们都同意

translation.en: This is great. And I've got the third vote.
translation.zh: 太好了 我有第三票了

translation.en: Let me ask you a question. What-- What's your gut on this?
translation.zh: 我问你一个问题 你的直觉是什么？

translation.en: [Mike] Suddenly, I have a guy
translation.zh: 突然间 我有个

translation.en: who's violated every drug law known to man,
translation.zh: 违反了所有已知毒品法的人

translation.en: and I'm afraid of how the fans are gonna react to this.
translation.zh: 我很害怕粉丝会作何反应

translation.en: I've worked really hard to get a PG rating.
translation.zh: 我真的很努力 不要牵扯少儿不宜的东西

translation.en: I… I just really… I just really can't do this.
translation.zh: 我真的做不到

translation.en: The temperature in the car is now about -40 degrees Fahrenheit,
translation.zh: 车里的温度能有零下40度

translation.en: until Libby really weighs in with her opinion.
translation.zh: 直到利比开口说出了她的观点

translation.en: And Libby's opinion is, "You hypocrite!"
translation.zh: 利比的观点是“你这个伪君子！”

translation.en: "Even if it's a fourth chance,
translation.zh: “就算是第四次机会

translation.en: you've already said you need 200 chances yourself."
translation.zh: 你也说了你自己需要200次机会”

translation.en: "And you're not gonna sign the guy because he has a drug history?"
translation.zh: “你因为那个人有吸毒史 就不签他吗？”

translation.en: "And you're a drunk, and you've had all of these kinds of problems."
translation.zh: “你自己还酗酒呢 有那么多麻烦”

translation.en: "You've done things you're not-- And you're not gonna sign Darryl--"
translation.zh: “你做过很多不光彩的… 你不签达尔…”

translation.en: Wow, you're really something.
translation.zh: 哇 你真行

translation.en: [chuckling] And she now doesn't talk to me for the rest of the trip.
translation.zh: 她在接下来的旅程中都不跟我说话了

translation.en: So when we get to the hotel room with the bottle of champagne,
translation.zh: 当我们带着一瓶香槟去酒店房间时

translation.en: she's, like, barricaded in her room.
translation.zh: 她就躲在自己的房间里

translation.en: She's ashamed.
translation.zh: 她很羞愧

translation.en: "Second chances?"
translation.zh: “第二次机会？”

translation.en: "You would not be here at all had you not gotten a second chance."
translation.zh: “如果没有第二次机会 你就不会在这里了”

translation.en: "Why on earth wouldn't you do that for Darryl?"
translation.zh: “你为什么不能为达尔这么做？”

translation.en: I feel terrible, having my back to you like this, so…
translation.zh: 我感觉很糟糕这样背对着你们 所以…

translation.en: Thank you very much for coming.
translation.zh: 我很感谢各位能来

translation.en: On the way to Owatonna last week,
translation.zh: 上周去奥瓦通纳的路上

translation.en: Marv Goldklang and Marty Scott mentioned Darryl Strawberry's name to me,
translation.zh: 马夫·戈德克朗和马蒂·斯科特 对我提到了达尔·史卓贝瑞的名字

translation.en: and the potential of… of signing him.
translation.zh: 和签下他的可能性

translation.en: And I was, at best, lukewarm.
translation.zh: 我充其量是不冷不热的

translation.en: And I apologize, uh, for that to the Strawberrys,
translation.zh: 我为此向史卓贝瑞道歉

translation.en: but that was… was my reaction.
translation.zh: 但那确实是我的反应

translation.en: I got a feel of how sincere he was, you know.
translation.zh: 我感受到了他有多真诚 你知道

translation.en: And that was a good feeling. That was different than most.
translation.zh: 那是一种很好的感觉 与大多数情况不同

translation.en: I believe Major League Baseball has blackballed me.
translation.zh: 我相信美国职业棒球大联盟反对我

translation.en: I'm not bitter about it. That's one thing I would like to say.
translation.zh: 我不抱怨 这是我想说的一件事

translation.en: Because I've had some great years that I can always remember.
translation.zh: 我经历了很多美好的时光 我会永远铭记

translation.en: [interviewer] Can you tell me what headspace you were in at that time?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你当时内心是什么状态

translation.en: Completely lost. You know? Lost for life.
translation.zh: 完全迷失了 你知道吗？人生迷失了

translation.en: Didn't-- Didn't really care about the fact of life existing anymore and living.
translation.zh: 根本已经不在乎生活的存在和活下去

translation.en: You lose hope.
translation.zh: 你失去了希望

translation.en: Nobody wanted to give me a chance at the time.
translation.zh: 当时没人想给我机会

translation.en: I was just living. I think I was just existing. Put it like that.
translation.zh: 我只是活着 我只是存在而已 这么说吧

translation.en: Tough business, Marty, you know.
translation.zh: 太难了 马蒂 你知道

translation.en: I really didn't have a care about baseball. I didn't care if I ever played again.
translation.zh: 我真的不在乎棒球 我不在乎我能否再回归

translation.en: I thought I could go there and hide and nobody would know anything. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我以为我可以进去躲在那里 没人会知道什么

translation.en: For me, that's the-- that's the kind of thought process I had at that particular time,
translation.zh: 那是我那段定时间的思维过程

translation.en: is to go there
translation.zh: 就是去那里

translation.en: and really actually just play, and see if I like baseball again.
translation.zh: 只是去玩 看看我能否再打棒球

translation.en: [Stevens] I came out, and the media was all ready for Darryl to come out.
translation.zh: 你知道 我出来了 媒体都准备好让达尔出来了

translation.en: And then all eyes and cameras going, "What the heck is going on?"
translation.zh: 然后所有的眼睛和摄像头都是： “到底什么情况？”

translation.en: [Mike] Wrote me letters, called me up.
translation.zh: 写信给我 打电话给我

translation.en: He goes, "You know, I don't have any legs."
translation.zh: 他说：“你知道 我没有腿”

translation.en: "But I want an at-bat."
translation.zh: “但我想要击球”

translation.en: I bothered him enough where he said, "Come out and let's see what you can do."
translation.zh: 我已经烦他很多次了 于是他说 “让我看看你能做什么”

translation.en: And the rest is history that nobody knows.
translation.zh: 剩下的就是没人知道的历史

translation.en: When I was a young kid and found out about Eddie Gaedel,
translation.zh: 我小时候发现了艾迪·盖德尔

translation.en: people always said, "You're as tall as Eddie Gaedel."
translation.zh: 人们总是说： “你和艾迪·盖德尔一样高”

translation.en: And I was like, "I'm an athlete, and one day, I'm gonna prove it."
